      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void VoxelSpace.add(VoxelSpace mask)
      sets 1 to cell where mask is 1
      void VoxelSpace.copy(VoxelSpace mask)
      copies the values from the mask
      void VoxelSpace.exclusiveOr(VoxelSpace mask)
      sets 0 to cell where mask and cell is 1, otherwise 1 if one of them is one
      void VoxelSpace.fill(VoxelSpace mask, float value)
      sets value to all cells where mask is 1
      void VoxelSpace.intersect(VoxelSpace mask)
      sets 1 to cell where mask and cell is 1, otherwise 0
      static void VoxelSpace.offsetSelection(float offset, VoxelSpace mask)
      1 is selected selection grows per offset, becomes 1 too.
      void VoxelSpace.select(float value, float offset, VoxelSpace mask)

      void VoxelSpace.subtract(VoxelSpace mask)
